(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN said)
        (NP
          (NP (DT that))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (JJ major) (NNS cuisines))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNP China))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubjpass(said-3, It-1)
auxpass(said-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, said-3)
dobj(said-3, that-4)
prep(that-4, of-5)
predet(cuisines-9, all-6)
det(cuisines-9, the-7)
amod(cuisines-9, major-8)
pobj(of-5, cuisines-9)
prep(cuisines-9, of-10)
pobj(of-10, China-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Teochew) (NN food))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (NP
        (NP (DT the)
          (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ suitable)))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ Japanese) (NN palate)))))
    (. .)))


nn(food-2, Teochew-1)
nsubj(suitable-7, food-2)
cop(suitable-7, is-3)
advmod(suitable-7, probably-4)
det(suitable-7, the-5)
advmod(suitable-7, most-6)
root(ROOT-0, suitable-7)
prep(suitable-7, for-8)
det(palate-11, the-9)
amod(palate-11, Japanese-10)
pobj(for-8, palate-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN emphasis))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP
          (NP
            (NP (NN freshness))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN seafood))))
          (CC and)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN use))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (JJ simple) (NNS flavors))))))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB highlight)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ original) (NN flavor))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NN produce))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ similar)))
    (. .)))


det(emphasis-2, The-1)
nsubj(similar-23, emphasis-2)
prep(emphasis-2, on-3)
pobj(on-3, freshness-4)
prep(freshness-4, of-5)
pobj(of-5, seafood-6)
cc(freshness-4, and-7)
det(use-9, the-8)
conj(freshness-4, use-9)
prep(use-9, of-10)
amod(flavors-12, simple-11)
pobj(of-10, flavors-12)
aux(highlight-14, to-13)
infmod(emphasis-2, highlight-14)
det(flavor-17, the-15)
amod(flavor-17, original-16)
dobj(highlight-14, flavor-17)
prep(flavor-17, of-18)
det(produce-20, the-19)
pobj(of-18, produce-20)
cop(similar-23, is-21)
advmod(similar-23, very-22)
root(ROOT-0, similar-23)
